Will's Guide to Computing for Forgetful Power Users
About

Hello, welcome to my tiny corner of tech knowledge. Here, you will find mostly miscellaneous tech advice, no-nonsense guides, and occasional notes. This site is also open to suggestions and user-submitted content. If you have some nifty advice about Linux, submit a pull request! Additionally, I'll probably put some neat-o project sites and/or pages on here. It'll be great!
